      • Checkbox

        public Checkbox(java.awt.Point position,
        java.lang.String text,
        int textWidth,
        boolean checked,
        boolean enabled,
        Window window)
        Creates a new checbox with a certain text, a start-state and an enable flag.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the checkbox.
        text - The text of the checkbox
        textWidth - The maximum width of the text. This enables automatic linebreaks
        checked - The start state of the checkbox.
        enabled - The enable-flag.
        window - The window this control is attached to.
